title: The Showman
creator_credit: Patrick Ryan, Eltham Films and Tim Burstall
brief_description: Sebastian the Fox is a child prodigy on the violin. A greedy showman attempts to exploit his talents by arranging a world concert tour. Sebastian finds a way to terminate the tour and return home. A Peter Scriven puppet; photographed by Giorgio Mangiamele; edited by Alan Harkness and Michael Thornhill; music by George Dreyfus.
